coverage.note: Low overall coverage is expected as this test focuses on a single processor file in isolation

testDetails.testName: should fetch conversations with NULL participant_username
should call Instagram API for each conversation
should update conversation with profile data
should return zero counts when no conversations with missing profiles
should use default batch size when not provided

rationale: All 9 integration tests passed successfully. The tests comprehensively validate the BackfillParticipantProfilesProcessor functionality including fetching conversations, calling Instagram API, updating profiles, rate limiting, retry logic, and error handling. Duration of 22.173s is acceptable for integration tests with deliberate delays for rate limiting validation.
